channel.title: Path and classpath help
channel.description: hi in eviroment variables theres a top bit and bottom bit and my bottom bit has got path and classpath but path is blank and at the top bit i got classpath and path with the right stuff _11 because i got jdk 11 and 7 i need to know where to put it...

item.title: Path and classpath help
item.dc:creator: @i_scary_i i scary i
item.description:
@i_scary_i wrote:

get jdk 6 update 10 and use as class path : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

and as path use : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin

Read full topic
